00001 #ifndef MWMECHANICS_SPELLSUCCESS_H
00002 #define MWMECHANICS_SPELLSUCCESS_H

00004 #include "../mwworld/ptr.hpp"
00005 #include "../mwworld/world.hpp"
00006 #include "../mwbase/environment.hpp"
00007 #include "../mwmechanics/creaturestats.hpp"

00011 namespace MWMechanics

00013     inline int spellSchoolToSkill(int school)
00014     {
00015         std::map<int, int> schoolSkillMap; // maps spell school to skill id
00016         schoolSkillMap[0] = 11; // alteration
00017         schoolSkillMap[1] = 13; // conjuration
00018         schoolSkillMap[3] = 12; // illusion
00019         schoolSkillMap[2] = 10; // destruction
00020         schoolSkillMap[4] = 14; // mysticism
00021         schoolSkillMap[5] = 15; // restoration
00022         assert(schoolSkillMap.find(school) != schoolSkillMap.end());
00023         return schoolSkillMap[school];
00024     }
00025 
00026     inline int getSpellSchool(const std::string& spellId, const MWWorld::Ptr& actor)
00027     {
00028         const ESM::Spell* spell = MWBase::Environment::get().getWorld()->getStore().spells.find(spellId);
00029         NpcStats& stats = MWWorld::Class::get(actor).getNpcStats(actor);
00030 
00031         // determine the spell's school
00032         // this is always the school where the player's respective skill is the least advanced
00033         // out of all the magic effects' schools
00034         const std::vector<ESM::ENAMstruct>& effects = spell->effects.list;
00035         int school = -1;
00036         int skillLevel = -1;
00037         for (std::vector<ESM::ENAMstruct>::const_iterator it = effects.begin();
00038             it != effects.end(); ++it)
00039         {
00040             const ESM::MagicEffect* effect = MWBase::Environment::get().getWorld()->getStore().magicEffects.find(it->effectID);
00041             int _school = effect->data.school;
00042             int _skillLevel = stats.mSkill[spellSchoolToSkill(_school)].getModified();
00043 
00044             if (school == -1)
00045             {
00046                 school = _school;
00047                 skillLevel = _skillLevel;
00048             }
00049             else if (_skillLevel < skillLevel)
00050             {
00051                 school = _school;
00052                 skillLevel = _skillLevel;
00053             }
00054         }
00055 
00056         return school;
00057     }
00058 
00059 
00060     // UESP wiki / Morrowind/Spells:
00061     // Chance of success is (Spell's skill * 2 + Willpower / 5 + Luck / 10 - Spell cost - Sound magnitude) * (Current fatigue + Maximum Fatigue * 1.5) / Maximum fatigue * 2
00068     inline float getSpellSuccessChance (const std::string& spellId, const MWWorld::Ptr& actor)
00069     {
00070         const ESM::Spell* spell = MWBase::Environment::get().getWorld()->getStore().spells.find(spellId);
00071 
00072         if (spell->data.flags & ESM::Spell::F_Always // spells with this flag always succeed (usually birthsign spells)
00073             || spell->data.type == ESM::Spell::ST_Power) // powers always succeed, but can be cast only once per day
00074             return 100.0;
00075 
00076         NpcStats& stats = MWWorld::Class::get(actor).getNpcStats(actor);
00077         CreatureStats& creatureStats = MWWorld::Class::get(actor).getCreatureStats(actor);
00078 
00079         int skillLevel = stats.mSkill[getSpellSchool(spellId, actor)].getModified();
00080 
00081         // Sound magic effect (reduces spell casting chance)
00082         int soundMagnitude = creatureStats.mMagicEffects.get (MWMechanics::EffectKey (48)).mMagnitude;
00083 
00084         int willpower = creatureStats.mAttributes[ESM::Attribute::Willpower].getModified();
00085         int luck = creatureStats.mAttributes[ESM::Attribute::Luck].getModified();
00086         int currentFatigue = creatureStats.mDynamic[2].getCurrent();
00087         int maxFatigue = creatureStats.mDynamic[2].getModified();
00088         int spellCost = spell->data.cost;
00089 
00090         // There we go, all needed variables are there, lets go
00091         float chance = (float(skillLevel * 2) + float(willpower)/5.0 + float(luck)/ 10.0 - spellCost - soundMagnitude) * (float(currentFatigue + maxFatigue * 1.5)) / float(maxFatigue * 2.0);
00092 
00093         chance = std::max(0.0f, std::min(100.0f, chance)); // clamp to 0 .. 100
00094 
00095         return chance;
00096     }
00097 }
